summary: Loads and serves the Pubmed citation network as a DGL graph, including 500‑dimensional node features, train/validation/test masks, and class labels for node classification tasks. Supports optional reverse edges, graph reordering, and user‑defined transforms, with caching and reload control.
business_intent: Provide researchers and developers with an easy‑to‑use, preprocessed graph dataset for training and evaluating graph neural network models on citation‑based node classification problems.
